config.title: =items.temporaryManualMode.state == 'ON' ? 'Manual Mode' : (items.temporaryBoostMode.state == 'ON' ? 'Boost Mode' : 'Auto Mode')
config.label: =(items['tickSecond'].state >= 0 || true) && items['temporaryManualMode'].state == 'ON' && Number(items['temporaryManualModeOffTime'].state) > 0 ? (Math.floor((Number(items['temporaryManualModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) / 3600) + ':' + ('0' + Math.floor(((Number(items['temporaryManualModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) % 3600) / 60)).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0' + Math.floor((Number(items['temporaryManualModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) % 60)).slice(-2)) : (items['temporaryBoostMode'].state == 'ON' && Number(items['temporaryBoostModeOffTime'].state) > 0 ? (Math.floor((Number(items['temporaryBoostModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) / 3600) + ':' + ('0' + Math.floor(((Number(items['temporaryBoostModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) % 3600) / 60)).slice(-2) + ':' + ('0' + Math.floor((Number(items['temporaryBoostModeOffTime'].state) - dayjs().unix()) % 60)).slice(-2)) : '')
